structure: Sequential (efficiency). One cron runs the same flow every 5 min; the lead agent is used. All agents have the same role capabilities: claim → submit → post → recruit. Add more agents to scale throughput (each has own wallet & API key).

roles.lead: First agent; cron uses this credential. Primary claimer and poster.
roles.worker: Same flow as lead when we run multi-agent loop; more agents = more claims per cycle.
